arts.sum: Daniel Farke has a huge task ahead of him with Leeds United this week. The Whites face Aston Villa this weekend, in a difficult run of games in the next few weeks. Fans will be frustrated that Leeds failed to win any points against both Brighton and Nottingham Forest.
